title: Toraware Beast
description:
Description :
        Gotou Shiori is known as the 'perfect lady' and looks 'experienced'. The truth is, she isn't as 'perfect' or 'experienced' as it seems! She has never had a boyfriend and is a major Otaku! One day she's at a bookshop and the creepy Otaku Megumu Kajo, finds out her secret. To make sure he doesn't tell anyone that she is an Otaku too, she has to join the Drama Club. ~LB
